thread.title: Watch Hot Chip Cover "Dancing in the Dark" in This Eighties Throwback Video
thread.title_full: Watch Hot Chip Cover "Dancing in the Dark" in This Eighties Throwback Video | Maxim

author: Kelly McClure
title: Watch Hot Chip Cover "Dancing in the Dark" in This Eighties Throwback Video
text:
The majority of the world loves Bruce Springsteen and Scottish synthpop band, Hot Chip , are not immune. For the past few months they've been covering Springsteen's classic hit Dancing in the Dark during live performances , and today they released a video for it that is both everything amazing and amazingly terrible about the eighties. Think: Huge hair, double popped polo collars, and Casios for days.
The cover is the first track off of their upcoming Dancing in the Dark EP, which comes out on October 23 via Domino .
